full_description:
ACEFAST T6 ENC True Wireless Stereo Earbuds

The ACEFAST T6 is a high-quality and feature-rich Bluetooth headset that is designed for music listening and hands-free calling. It has the latest Bluetooth version v5.0 and Bestechnic BES2300IU chip, which provide a reliable and stable wireless connection. It supports SBC/AAC audio decoding protocol and has a frequency response range of 20Hz~20kHz. The transmission distance is ≥10m, allowing for a stable and clear connection.

Long Lasting Battery Life

The ACEFAST T6 has a battery capacity of 40mAh and can work for 4 hours in music mode and 3 hours in call mode. The charging case has a capacity of 500mAh and can provide an additional 20 hours of working time. The headset can be charged in about 1 hour and the charging case in about 2 hours. The charging case input is DC5V / 0.4A. It supports fast charging, which allows you to charge the device for 10 minutes and use it for 1.5 hours. 

IPX4 Waterproof

It also has an IPX4 waterproof rating, making it suitable for use in different environments. It has several certifications including CE, RoHS, FCC, EAC, TELEC, BQB, and UL62368 test reports, ensuring that it meets safety and quality standards.

LED Digital Display

The ACEFAST T6 TWS headset has several features such as LED digital display and ENC noise reduction for clear calls. The headset is made of translucent material and it offers a sleek and stylish design.
